Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of eight lines of Coptic text written in black ink, the exterior is unelaborated.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394350) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394350)
